column3: Input a valid email address in the email field and click the send button
column5: The system should restore the email successfully
column7: Email field should display and accept input. Input a valid email address. Click the send button. Check that the email is restored successfully.

column3: Input an invalid email address in the email field and click the send button
column5: The system should not restore any email

column5: The system should not restore any email and provide an error message
column7: Click the send button without entering an email address. Check that no email is restored and an error message is displayed.
